page.title: 11Winchfield Area - Industry.
page.content: There isn't much in the way of industry within the block. Planning permission has been granted for {industrial units}to the south of Winchfield Station but work hasn't commenced yet. They will be ideal for local people just starting out in business. Several people have{small {businesses}in the former goods yard. {'Winchfield Pottery'}is also close to the railway station. The Potter has been there since 1972 & she special- ises in making wall clocks, many of which have gone abroad as presents. Most of her pottery is 'thrown' on a wheel & is made of stoneware or porcelain. At Phoenix Green there is a young{farrier}who has been trading in the old smithy since 1977 (see photo- graph & caption). There is also a {wholesale nursery}at Winchfield Lodge which deals mainly with 'Heathers'.
